resources.string: Share your most cherished memories with total control.
Easily create links to privately shared content that limit how many people can access the content or for how long.
Preserve your most important documents with peace of mind.
We are the most comprehensive consumer digital preservation platform available today.
We will never mine your data, claim your copyright or invade your privacy.
We are backed by a mission-driven, cultural heritage nonprofit dedicated to the public good.
